contents:
Introduction Welcome to my first blog post! This post demonstrates the features of the BitsByMe Hugo theme.
Features Code Blocks Here’s some Python code:
def hello_world(): print("Hello, World!") hello_world() Callout Blocks You can create helpful tips using blockquotes that start with “TIP:”
Informational callouts work the same way with “INFO:”
Lists Here are some features:
Clean, responsive design Syntax highlighting Search functionality Tag and series support Links Check out Hugo for more information about static sites.
Conclusion This theme makes it easy to create a beautiful technical blog.
title: My First Blog Post

contents:
Today I learned that Hugo shortcodes let you create reusable content snippets!
Example Instead of repeating HTML, you can create a shortcode like:
{{< tip >}} This is a helpful tip! {{< /tip >}} This keeps your content clean and maintainable.
title: Hugo Shortcodes
